description: Detects a suspicious 7zip execution that involves a file with a ".dmp"/".dump" extension, which could be a step in a process of dump file exfiltration
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: 7Zip Compressing Dump Files
query: (((winlog.event_data.Description:*7\-Zip*) OR (process.executable.text:("*\\7z.exe" OR "*\\7zr.exe" OR "*\\7za.exe")) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("7z.exe" OR "7za.exe"))) AND process.command_line.text:("*.dmp*" OR "*.dump*"))
